description:
Section 73 application for the variation of Condition 2 (Drawings and Document Numbers) of permission ref: P2019/0406/S73 dated 15/10/2019, which allowed for external alterations and internal reconfigurations to the previously permitted development approved under application ref: P2015/2199/FUL dated 14/04/2016 for: 'Reconfiguration and extensions to the existing building, including excavation at basement level and the erection of ground/first floor front extension, erection of a fourth floor roof extension with the creation of  fifth floor roof terraces and the change use of the third floor (office use) of the building together with the proposed fourth floor roof extension  to create 5 self-contained residential units (4x 2 beds & 1 x 3 bed) and associated alterations.' The amendments sought under this Section 73 application include:
- internal alterations including reconfiguration and renumbering of units; and
- external alterations including provision of new plant enclosure at roof level.
